SELECT p.title , p.content , m1.name AS author_name , m2.name AS modifier_name , p.created_at , p.modified_at FROM post p INNER JOIN member m1 ON p.author_no = m1.no LEFT JOIN member m2 ON p.modifier_no = m2.no WHERE p.no = #{postNo}
SELECT p.author_no FROM post p WHERE p.no = #{postNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE post p SET deleted_at = UNIX_TIMESTAMP() WHERE p.no = #{postNo}
mapper.select: SELECT p.no , p.title , m.name AS author_name , p.created_at FROM post p INNER JOIN member m ON p.author_no = m.no WHERE p.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY p.no DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
